Which deployment action is performed using the vRealize Easy Installer?

choices.D: Register vRealize Automation with VMware Identity Manager
choices.A: Register vRealize Automation with vCenter Single Sign-On

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Register vRealize Automation with VMware Identity Manager: VMware Identity Manager is a component of the Workspace ONE suite that provides a single sign-on (SSO) experience for users across all of their applications, including vRealize Automation. During the vRealize Automation deployment process using the vRealize Easy Installer, the administrator can choose to register vRealize Automation with VMware Identity Manager, which enables users to access vRealize Automation from the Workspace ONE portal.

Therefore, the correct answer is D. Register vRealize Automation with VMware Identity Manager.
